pageContent:
Title:The Wizard of Oz

year: 1939

actors: Judy Garland, Frank Morgan, Ray Bolger

storyline: A young girl named Dorothy is transported to the magical land of Oz, where she embarks on a journey to find the Wizard and return home. Along the way, she befriends the Scarecrow, the Tin Man, and the Cowardly Lion.

Title:Inception

year: 2010

actors: Leonardo DiCaprio, Joseph Gordon-Levitt, Ellen Page

storyline: Dom Cobb is a skilled thief who specializes in entering people's dreams to steal their secrets. He's given a challenging task: instead of stealing an idea, he must plant one in a person's mind.

Title:The Shawshank Redemption

year: 1994

actors: Tim Robbins, Morgan Freeman, Bob Gunton

storyline: Andy Dufresne, a banker wrongfully convicted of murder, navigates life in Shawshank State Penitentiary. He forms a unique friendship with fellow inmate Red and works to clear his name.

Title:The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring

year: 2001

actors: Elijah Wood, Ian McKellen, Viggo Mortensen

storyline: Frodo Baggins embarks on a perilous journey to destroy a powerful ring and prevent it from falling into the hands of the dark lord Sauron. He's accompanied by a fellowship of diverse characters with their own strengths.

Title:Pulp Fiction

year: 1994

actors: John Travolta, Samuel L. Jackson, Uma Thurman

storyline: The lives of several characters intertwine in a series of interconnected stories involving crime, redemption, and bizarre occurrences. The film weaves together humor, violence, and drama in Quentin Tarantino's signature style.

Title:The Matrix

year: 1999

actors: Keanu Reeves, Laurence Fishburne, Carrie-Anne Moss

storyline: Neo, a computer programmer, discovers that the world he knows is an illusion created by intelligent machines. He joins a group of rebels led by Morpheus to challenge the reality and fight against the machines' control.

Title:Jurassic Park

year: 1993

actors: Sam Neill, Laura Dern, Jeff Goldblum

storyline: A group of scientists and visitors get trapped on an island theme park where genetically-engineered dinosaurs roam freely. Chaos ensues as they struggle to survive and escape from the deadly creatures.

Title:Avatar

year: 2009

actors: Sam Worthington, Zoe Saldana, Sigourney Weaver

storyline: In the year 2154, humans colonize the distant moon Pandora for its resources. A paraplegic former Marine is tasked with infiltrating the indigenous Na'vi people by using an avatar, but he becomes torn between his loyalty and the Na'vi culture.

Title:Forrest Gump

year: 1994

actors: Tom Hanks, Robin Wright, Gary Sinise

storyline: Forrest Gump, a kind-hearted man with limited intellectual abilities, unwittingly becomes part of several defining moments in 20th-century America. His life story is a touching and often humorous journey of love, success, and adversity.

Title:Interstellar

year: 2014

actors: Matthew McConaughey, Anne Hathaway, Jessica Chastain

storyline: In a future where Earth is facing an agricultural crisis, a group of astronauts embarks on a space mission through a wormhole near Saturn to find a new habitable planet for humanity. The journey tests their limits and explores the mysteries of time and space.

Title:The Dark Knight

year: 2008

actors: Christian Bale, Heath Ledger, Aaron Eckhart

storyline: Batman faces his ultimate nemesis, the Joker, a psychopathic criminal mastermind who wreaks havoc on Gotham City. As the Joker's chaotic plans unfold, Batman must confront his own moral dilemmas and decide what it truly means to be a hero.

Title:Toy Story

year: 1995

actors: Tom Hanks, Tim Allen, Don Rickles

storyline: Toys come to life when humans are not around, and they have their own world. Woody, a cowboy doll, becomes threatened when a new spaceman toy, Buzz Lightyear, takes his place as the favorite toy. Through adventures and challenges, they learn the value of friendship.

Title:Eternal Sunshine of the Spotless Mind

year: 2004

actors: Jim Carrey, Kate Winslet, Elijah Wood

storyline: Joel and Clementine undergo a medical procedure to erase memories of each other after a failed relationship. As their memories are erased one by one, Joel realizes that he wants to hold on to certain moments, leading to a unique and introspective journey.

Title:For a Few Dollars More

year: 1965

actors: Clint Eastwood, Lee Van Cleef, Gian Maria Volont√®

storyline: Two bounty hunters, Monco and Colonel Douglas Mortimer, independently pursue the notorious outlaw El Indio. As they navigate a dangerous world of deception and revenge, their paths cross and alliances shift in a quest for the ultimate bounty.
